AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: Child CCH Verification Failed Interaction Add Form 2 (Wrapped)
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: Used to create a field memo interaction on the child when the CCH does not pass validation.
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

c:Constraint.Name: CK_INTERACTION_ISPLANNEDONLYWHENSTEP
c:Constraint.c:CustomErrorMsg: Status code 'Planned' is reserved for use on step interactions.

c:Constraint.Name: UIX_INTERACTIONPARTICIPANT_INTERACTIONID_CONSTITUENTID
c:Constraint.c:CustomErrorMsg: The participant can only be added to an interaction once.

c:Constraint.Name: UIX_INTERACTIONSITE_INTERACTIONID_SITEID
c:Constraint.c:CustomErrorMsg: A site cannot be assigned to an interaction more than once.

c:Constraint.Name: CK_INTERACTION_VALIDEXPECTEDTIMERANGE
c:Constraint.c:CustomErrorMsg: The expected start time must be before or the same as the expected end time.

c:Constraint.Name: CK_INTERACTION_VALIDACTUALTIMERANGE
c:Constraint.c:CustomErrorMsg: The actual start time must be before or the same as the actual end time.
